casebody.data:
STATE OF CONNECTICUT v. CURTIS WIDLAK G. Douglas Nash, public defender, in support of the petition. Toni M. Smith-Rosario, assistant state’s attorney, in opposition. Decided May 28, 2003

NORCOTT and KATZ, Js., did not participate in the consideration or decision of this petition.

No opinion found.Click here to view source material.
